thread.section_title: Five9 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Five9 | www.five9.com | 3 of 9
thread.title: Dan

author: Dan
title: Dan
text: It is being used by our sales department our CSR department and our QA department. It is a great communication tool, to contact our customers. The best thing about it is its reports are customizable. You can gather as much data as you want (within the last 60 days) The thing I would want improved are the integrations, and the overall friendliness of the UI, it can be scary and hard to use.
